fields.name: hostname
fields.label: Hostname
fields.description: Provide the hostname of author instance (without the ending slash) e.g. https://author-pXXXXX-eXXXXXXX.adobeaemcloud.com

fields.name: theme_cf_reference
fields.label: Brand Theme
fields.description: Select the CF with authored values for the brand theme. This will be applied on the pages

fields.name: js-files
fields.label: JS Library URL(s)
fields.description: List of js libraries to include under head section of the page

fields.name: sec-spacing
fields.label: Spacing Top (padding top)
fields.description: Section top spacing, default is 32px.

fields.name: sec-spacing-bottom
fields.label: Spacing Bottom (padding bottom)
fields.description: Section bottom spacing, default is 32px.

fields.name: variation
fields.label: Variation
fields.description: Provide variation name to retrieve the CF content. If left empty, by default master variation will be used.

fields.label: Enable Underline in Title
fields.description: Enable underline in title
fields.name: enableunderline
delivery_Type
fields.label: Delivery Type
fields.description: 'Dynamic Media' will be rendered by providing dynamic media server URL. 'Dynamic Media with OpenAPI' will use openAPI delivery with additional options to manipulate the image rendering on the fly.

fields.name: image
fields.label: Image
fields.description: Select AEM DAM repository from asset selector if using Delivery Type as Dynamic Media. Select DM delivery repository from asset selector if using Delivery Type as Dynamic Media with OpenAPI

fields.name: rotation
fields.label: Rotation
fields.description: Select the rotation which will rotate the image.

fields.name: flip
fields.label: Flip
fields.description: Select the flip for the image either vertical or horizontal or vertical & horizontal

fields.name: crop
fields.label: Crop
fields.description: Crop the final image using four values: left, top, width, and height, all in percentages. For example, 10p,10p,50p,50p means crop the image starting 10% from the left and top, and take 50% of the image's width and height.
Any direct full URL of publicly available video. e.g. video URL of aem publish instance, Dynamic Media etc.
fields.name: videoUrl
fields.label: Video Url

fields.name: iframeUrl
fields.label: iFrame URL
fields.description: Please provide a URL to an iFrame app.

fields.name: config_source
fields.label: Template Config Source
fields.description: Choose the source to provide the template path and variable configurations.

fields.name: dm_template_url
fields.label: Template Path
fields.description: Provide full URL for the Dynamic Media Template. Templates should have variables which can be configured in Variable Mappings field.

fields.name: var_mapping
fields.label: Variable Mappings
fields.description: Provide variable values. These values should be exposed in the DM template inorder to get replaced e.g. $leftImage=DynamicMediaNA/adobestock-167833331

fields.name: videoReference
fields.label: Video Reference
fields.description: Provide a URL for the video background.

fields.name: btn-link
fields.label: Button Link
fields.description: Path to linked AEM content

fields.label: Enable Swoosh Effect
fields.description: Enable Circular effect on the component
fields.name: useSwoosh
